tobalciomodel 1.1.0

  • Technical documentation

Generate IO Inputs from STAPM Models

GenInputsSTAPM.Rd

Function to read in and further process the outputs of STAPM price policy modelling economic outcomes. Produces the change in demand for tobacco, on-trade alcohol and off-trade alcohol measured in basic prices and also the net change in government revenue.

GenInputsSTAPM(
  root = NULL,
  label = NULL,
  label2 = NULL,
  min_age = NULL,
  index_year = NULL,
  policy_effect_year = NULL,
  n_years = 1,
  write_inputs,
  name
)

Arguments

root

Character - the file path to the folder storing STAPM raw output
label

Character - the label used to identify the set of model runs.
label2

Character vector - vector of treatment labels identifying specific model runs.
min_age

Numeric - Youngest age included in the model.
index_year

Numeric - Model index year.
policy_effect_year

Numeric - Year in which new price policy is implemented in STAPM.
n_years

Numeric - Number of years including the policy effect year for which to generate inputs (defaults to 1 - policy effect year only).
write_inputs

Character - file path to the folder to which the input data will be written.
name

Character - file name for the input data.

Value

Examples


if (FALSE) {

}
